```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf)

```

```{r}
# Read in US national forest files
national_forests <- st_read(here("data", "S_USA.AdministrativeForest", "S_USA.AdministrativeForest.shp"))
```
```{r}
# Eldorado National Forest
eldorado <- national_forests %>% 
  filter(FORESTNAME == "Eldorado National Forest")
```

```{r}
plot(eldorado)
```

```{r}
st_write(eldorado, "eldorado.shp", drive="ESRI Shapefile")
```
